Package edu.citadel.compiler.util

Class BitUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.citadel.compiler.util.BitUtil
  • public class BitUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates several bit manipulation utility methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BitUtil()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static short binaryStringToShort​(java.lang.String bits)
      Converts a string of 16 0s and 1s to a short value.
      static int bitsToInt​(int value, int n)
      Returns the n least significant (rightmost) bits in the specified value as a signed (2s complement) integer.
      static int bitsToUnsigned​(int value, int n)
      Returns the n least significant (rightmost) bits in the specified value as an unsigned integer; i.e., the most significant bit is not interpreted as a sign bit.
      static java.lang.String toBinaryString​(byte n)
      Returns a binary string representation of the specified byte.
      static java.lang.String toBinaryString​(byte n, int numBits)
      Returns a binary string representation of the least significant (right mode) bits for the specified byte.
      static java.lang.String toBinaryString​(int n)
      Returns a binary string representation of the specified integer.
      static java.lang.String toBinaryString​(int n, int numBits)
      Returns a binary string representation of the least significant (right most) bits for the specified int.
      static java.lang.String toBinaryString​(short n)
      Returns a binary string representation of the specified short.
      static java.lang.String toBinaryString​(short n, int numBits)
      Returns a binary string representation of the least significant (right mode) bits for the specified short.
      static java.lang.String toHexString​(byte n)
      Returns a hex string representation of the specified byte.
      static java.lang.String toHexString​(int n)
      Returns a hexadecimal string representation of the specified integer.
      static java.lang.String toHexString​(short n)
      Returns a hexadecimal string representation of the specified short.
